duties_responsibilities.duty: Transform client maturity, improve control environments, create new client offerings, define and lead engagements, sell meaningful services, and grow and manage a diverse team.

Influence, shape, and grow the Security Advisory practice, working with the North America Security Advisory Lead, and regional security resources to be a part of our 2023 Accelerated Security ambition.
Drive multi-million sales and revenues and be responsible for achieving and building out a strong consultancy project pipeline.
Understand clients’ security needs, solve unique problems, and work with clients from the earliest visions to the final experience.
Shape commercial models, risk, and go-to-market across a range of security capabilities including Strategy & GRC, IAM, Data Protection, and Cloud.

Shape, define, and guide transformative projects which enhance maturity, define strategy, solve technology issues, optimize business processes, provide assurance, strengthen controls, reduce security risk, and enable new secure ways of working.
Drive industry aligned focus, bringing together GTM offerings and taking them to the industry verticals via sales teams.
Help grow and nurture our internal talent, passing on knowledge and experience to create the leaders of the future.
Hire consulting specialists from diverse backgrounds to build a strong team.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Cyber Security, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
